{"step_by_step_thinking": "The investigator is studying bacterial adaptations to the environment in two isolates of Hemophilus influenzae type B: an infectious isolate and a noninfectious isolate. In this case, the noninfectious isolate is being exposed to lysed bacteria from the infectious isolate, which likely contains DNA that can be taken up by the noninfectious isolate.
